about_the_game:
Harvest Bliss is a relaxing, cozy, and fun game that combines farming and clicking elements, with a focus on constructing, farm customization, raising animals, and managing resources effectively.

You collect resources from beginning, and expand your land as you go.

Mine, build, harvest, repeat 🌾.



Buy, feed, and take care of animals 🐄🐑🐔🐧




HUNDREDS OF ITEMS!



Main features:


  • Proximity Modifiers - This is the main game feature. Everything is affected by the proximity of other things. Unit placement is important. Correct placement can be very rewarding! Crops placed near scarecrows increase in quality, but placement near pollution sources can decrease the quality of the crops. The terrain is sensitive to proximity too!
  • Content Heavy - Hundreds of Items, dozens of structures!
  • Resource Collecting - Collect items from different sources; some items are more challenging to collect than others.
  • Animals - Buy and take care of animals!
  • Farm Customizations! - Customize your farm with many different decorations.
  • Expand Your Land - You start small, but you can buy land around you to expand your farm!
  • Achievements - Complete achievements to earn cosmetic and fun rewards.
  • Upgrade Units - Increase their production speed and unlock new production items!
  • Multiplayer Feature - Harvest Bliss can be played as single-player or multiplayer!

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10, 11 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 compatible graphics card, integrated graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Chop, mine, collect, build, and harvest! Raise animals, catch fish, and uncover hidden treasures. Harvest Bliss is a relaxing farming and building game where friends can join you too!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese
